cero.cero: Built a web application for managing courses, teachers, subjects, classes, and students, including generating reports for CACEI audits
cero.one: Reduced human error when filling out reports by 100% thanks to the automatic report generation feature
cero.two: Utilized the Django framework on the back-end and established APIs using the Django REST framework, improving development time thanks to the tools provided by this framework
cero.three: Successfully implemented authentication with Simple JWT, adding 1 extra layer of security to access all of the services
cero.four: Developed the frontend using Vue.js and added Tailwind for the UI, reducing the implementation time by 1 month

one.cero: Contributed to a desktop application with POS management, inventory management, supplier management, login, sales reporting, and ticketing features
one.one: Fixed the functionality of core modules, resolved critical bugs, improved the user interfaces, and optimized the code, increasing performance

two.cero: Zitheonsoft needed to create and implement a sales module for a software as a service, allowing users to purchase this service
two.one: Used Openpay for the transactions, encryption of data, and card validation, adding 3 steps of protection to the transaction
two.two: Constructed the back-end with Spring Boot and employed JPA for data persistence
two.three: Deployed Spring Security to authenticate using JWT, coupled with CORS configuration for protected server resource access, bolstering security across all services
two.four: Engineered the front-end with Angular and improved the landing page building process to less than 1 second
